content:
## Resilience Is a Design Choice

Resilience does not emerge accidentally. It is the result of deliberate trade-offs made long before pressure arrives. This essay explores why resilient systems often look inefficient, underwhelming, or even unsuccessful â€” right up until they outlast everything else.

---

tags: ðŸ”’ Resilience Is a Design Choice

Resilience does not emerge accidentally. It is the result of deliberate trade-offs made long before pressure arrives. This essay explores why resilient systems often look inefficient, underwhelming, or even unsuccessful â€” right up until they outlast everything else.
